Container.Name: Pangolin
Container.Overview:
Pangolin (https://github.com/fosrl/pangolin) is a tunneled reverse proxy server and dashboard UI with identity and access control built in. Pangolin can optionally be used in Local mode as a normal reverse proxy for users who don't want/need tunnels, but still want to take advantage of its excellent authentication features.
Chat with us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/HCJR8Xhme4
Container.Category: Security: Tools: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Management Network:VPN Network:Other

Config.Name: Server Admin Email
Config.Description: This will override anything in the config file.

Config.Name: Server Admin Password
Config.Description: This will override anything in the config file.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: This port must match server.next_port in the config file.

Config.Name: External API Port
Config.Description: This port must match server.external_port in the config file.

Config.Name: Internal API Port
Config.Description: This port must match server.internal_port in the config file.
